name: Raf
description: '''Raffaele Riefoli''' (born 29 September 1959), known as simply '''Raf''', is an Italian singer-songwriter. He first became known in the early 1980s as a singer of [[Italo disco]] and as original singer and co-author of the hit "[[Self Control (Raf song)|Self Control]]". He has turned to Italian-language music since the late 1980s and had further hits in his home country.
